otherNames: Kabushiki Gaisha Magi Lumiere, 株式会社マジルミエ
synopsis: "Magical Girl"—A profession that undertakes the work of exterminating a kind of natural disaster called "Kaii." Kana Sakuragi, a female college student who struggles with job hunting, is picked up by a magical girl startup company and...?! Magical Girl work-life starts now!
